alert.note: Alert for West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 11 at 4:14AM CST until February 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Less than one inch of additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause whiteout conditions, especially in open country. * WHERE...West Becker and West Otter Tail Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Whiteout conditions are expected in open country. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
